lead_paragraph: TAFT--Adrienne. The Officers and Clergy of Temple Israel of the City of New York mourn the passing of longtime member Adrienne Taft. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her bereaved family. Andrew Hoffman, President David J. Gelfand, Rabbi 1/3
snippet: TAFT--Adrienne. The Officers and Clergy of Temple Israel of the City of New York mourn the passing of longtime member Adrienne Taft. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her bereaved family. Andrew Hoffman, President David J. Gelfand, Rabbi 1/3
